closest.pro


top source closest

result = closest(array, value)

NAME: CLOSEST

PURPOSE: Find the element of ARRAY that is the closest in value to VALUE

CATEGORY: utilities

CALLING SEQUENCE: index = CLOSEST(array,value)

INPUTS: ARRAY = the array to search VALUE = the value we want to find the closest approach to

OUTPUTS: INDEX = the index into ARRAY which is the element closest to VALUE

OPTIONAL PARAMETERS: none

COMMON BLOCKS: none. SIDE EFFECTS: none. MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Trevor Harris, Physics Dept., University of Adelaide, July, 1990.

Parameters

array
value
